reviews.text: Re the comments regarding platform size and staff: platforms are large and there are never any problems caused by the platform size; the staff, in my experience, are always useful and cooperative.

Platforms too short for trains. Hence overcrowding in front carriages. Not much platform cover in rain... worse after new roof. Worst and most dangerous stairs anywhere. Passengers take ages to pile up and file down narrow staircase that ensures getting from the platform to the exit takes a rediculous amount of time and queuing passengers are forced to the edge of the platform with high speed trains hurtling by at top speed.
Staff are not helpful and couldn't cope with the most basic questions on off peak travel and returns. I made a mistake on a purchase and the guard was down right rude. Avoid if possible.
